contentrichtext.text: {{Nihongo|'''Fukushima'''|福島|''Fukushima''|"Good-Fortune Island"}} may refer to: ==People== *[[Fukushima (surname)]] ==Places== *[[Fukushima, Fukushima]], capital city of Fukushima Prefecture, Japan *[[Fukushima Prefecture]], Japanese prefecture *Two nuclear power plants located in Fukushima Prefecture: **[[Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant]] ***The [[Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster]] of March 2011 **[[Fukushima Daini Nuclear Power Plant]] (Fukushima Dai-ni) *[[Fukushima-ku, Osaka]], ward in [[Osaka]], Japan *[[Fukushima, Hokkaidō]], town in Hokkaido, Japan *[[Fukushima-juku]], former post town on the Nakasendō and Kisoji, located in Nagano Prefecture *[[Mount Fukushima]], peak in Antarctica ==Other uses== *[[Fukushima University]], national university in Japan {{disambiguation|geo}}
